Joy.description: feels joyfull because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Joy.coping: Replaying the Event: Mentally revisiting the joyful experience.
Joy.action_tendency: Smiling or Laughing: Displaying facial expressions of happiness.

Distress.description: feels distress because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Distress.coping: Avoidance: Distracting oneself with other activities like watching TV.
Distress.action_tendency: Seeking Comfort: Looking for support from others.

Happy-for.description: feels happy for {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Happy-for.coping: Congratulating: Verbally expressing happiness for the other person
Happy-for.action_tendency: Joining in Celebration: Participating in activities that celebrate the other person’s success.

Gloating.description: feels like gloating at {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Gloating.coping: Internal Satisfaction: Enjoying the feeling privately.
Gloating.action_tendency: Bragging: Talking about the success to others.

Resentment.description: feels resentment towards {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Resentment.coping: Avoidance: Steering clear of the person or situation causing resentment.
Resentment.action_tendency: Complaining: Verbally expressing dissatisfaction about the perceived unfairness.

Sorry-for.description: feels sorry for {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Sorry-for.coping: Offering Help: Providing assistance or support.

Hope.description: feels hope because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Hope.coping: Talking to Others: Discussing future possibilities.

Fear.description: feels fear because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Fear.coping: Seeking Reassurance: Talking to someone to feel safer.
Fear.action_tendency: Fleeing: Trying to escape the feared situation.

Relief.description: feels relief because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Relief.coping: Relaxation: Engaging in activities like watching TV or taking a nap.
Relief.action_tendency: Relaxing Posture: Slumping shoulders or reclining.

Disappointment.description: feels disappointment because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Disappointment.coping: Rumination: Continuously thinking about the disappointing event.
Disappointment.action_tendency: Withdrawing: Pulling back from social interactions.

Satisfaction.description: feels satisfaction because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Satisfaction.coping: Reflecting on Effort: Thinking back on the hard work that led to success.
Satisfaction.action_tendency: Rewarding Oneself: Treating oneself to something special.

Fears-confirmed.description: feels like their fears have been confirmed because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Fears-confirmed.coping: Seeking Help: Looking for advice or support from others.
Fears-confirmed.action_tendency: Panic: Agitated movements or frantic behavior.

Pride.description: feels pride because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Pride.coping: Displaying Achievements: Showing off accomplishments to others.
Pride.action_tendency: Standing Tall: An upright posture and confident movements.

Shame.description: feels shame because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Shame.coping: Self-Punishment: Mentally or physically punishing oneself
Shame.action_tendency: Hiding: Trying to physically or socially withdraw.

Admiration.description: feels admiration towards {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Admiration.coping: Learning: Trying to emulate the admired qualities.
Admiration.action_tendency: Expressing Appreciation: Verbally acknowledging the qualities admired.

Reproach.description: feels reproach towards {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Reproach.coping: Displacement: Redirecting the feelings of reproach towards another person or activity.
Reproach.action_tendency: Complaining: Expressing dissatisfaction to others about the person responsible.

Love.description: feels love towards {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Love.coping: Approach: seek to engage in activities that allow one to be close to, or use the source of love.
Love.action_tendency: Physical touch: all forms of physical touch, on the source of love.

Hate.description: feels hate towards {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Hate.coping: Withdrawal: Physically or emotionally distancing oneself from the source of hate.
Hate.action_tendency: Aggression: Displaying hostile behaviors or thoughts towards the object of hatred.

Gratification.description: feels gratified because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Gratification.coping: Self-Congratulation: Patting oneself on the back.
Gratification.action_tendency: Smiling or Laughing: Displaying facial expressions of happiness.

Remorse.description: feels remorsefull because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Remorse.coping: Self-Criticism: Mentally berating oneself for the mistake.

Gratitude.description: feels gratitude towards {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Gratitude.coping: Doing Favors: Returning the favor in some way.

Anger.description: feels angry towards {} because, after witnessing {}, they thought '{}'
Anger.coping: Distraction: Engaging in other activities to divert attention.
Anger.action_tendency: Yelling: Raising one’s voice or shouting.
